attributes.action: legislate a national standard of quality and quantity that local councils must maintain grassroots football facilities to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For years grassroots football clubs in the UK have been forced to use substandard pitches and facilities. 

Local facility forums organised by County FA's have been paid nothing more than lip service by Councils. Funding schemes exist but only for Clubs with either land or money.

Other countries like Netherlands, Spain, France and Germany are miles ahead of the UK on this matter. Even former Warsaw Pact countries have better pitches and facilities.
